nodes.text: Para fish were a species of fish native to the planet Bogano. They fed primarily on algae fragments and other plants, with many dying off when algae supplies were too low. Their decomposition process raised the acidity of the planet's water, which gradually wore away at the ground below and formed sinkholes that encompassed much of Bogano's landscape.
Para fish first appeared in the 2019 video game Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order, developed by Respawn Entertainment. In-game, they passively inhabit bodies of water on Bogano.
